meanings.sent1: The ironer pressed the wrinkles out of the shirt.
meanings.sent2: My mom is the best ironer in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The ironer accidentally ironed a crease into the pants.
meanings.sent4: She was like an ironer of problems, smoothing out any issues that arose.
meanings.sent5: The diligent ironer made sure every garment was perfectly pressed.

meanings.definition: A machine used for ironing clothes.
meanings.sent1: The laundry room had a new ironer that made ironing faster.
meanings.sent2: The industrial ironer at the dry cleaners was huge.
meanings.sent3: The ironer seemed to have a mind of its own, turning on at random times.
meanings.sent4: The ironer hummed softly as it worked, like a content machine.
meanings.sent5: The steam ironer transformed wrinkled clothes into smooth perfection.
